title: Hour 3 - Steve Kerr (04-15-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Steve Kerr (04-15-20)
description:
Steve Kerr says he would rather have his life over Allen Iverson but not Michael Jordan. He also said he would rather have Steph Curry's life over Scottie Pippen's. Dan talks about the President wanting to re-open sports.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
